itunes:title: Fighting The Hostess
title: Fighting The Hostess
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
description:
A restaurant fight, watching a new tv series, losing the bet for sunglasses, and creating the world's first computer. This is Lightweights, the world's best podcast.


Watch our FULL Video Podcast on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjmqbxZsoH1YwihrGgU1vPA


Follow our Podcast on Instagram: @lightweightspod https://www.instagram.com/lightweights

Follow Joe on Instagram: @thejoe https://www.instagram.com/thejoe/

Follow Ilya on Instagram: @ilyafeddy https://www.instagram.com/ilyafeddy/

Follow us on Tik Tok @lightweightspod
